layer.name: Fellowship
layer.definition: Building relationships with friends who are on the journey with you; mutual investment, transparency, and sharpening. 'Two are better than one' (Ecclesiastes 4:9-12). 'Iron sharpens iron' (Proverbs 27:17).

questions.text: I have people who know what I've committed to and ask me if I've done it.
I tell people my goals specifically so they can hold me accountable — I invite the pressure.
I hold others accountable for their commitments — I ask, I follow up, I don't let them off the hook.
When I fail to follow through, I tell my accountability partners honestly rather than hiding or making excuses.
My execution accountability relationships have actually improved my follow-through — they work.
